replies.body:
If you're having connection issues, contact us anytime! 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

The connection guide linked here is a great first step at resolving the issue. Additionally, since you mentioned your WiFi is giving you issues, I recommend switching to a wired connection. While WiFi is convenient, it can often cause issues with games like League that requires a constant and stable connection. 

I also wanted to mention that regardless of the reason for disconnection, all disconnections from a match will negatively impact everyone in the match. This is a key reason as to why [the Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be modified or removed.

Let me know if moving from WiFi or any of the connection guide steps helped out.
